complaint.description: Purchased 5G LTE Package at R499 per month, received ZTE Router and Nano Sim Card, but no signal. Emailed for assistance but no response from a human. R499 was deducted.
complaint.suggestion: Investigate the issue with the signal and provide a solution. Improve customer service response time.

meta.review_content: Purchased 5G LTE Package at R499 per month, They delivered a ZTE Router and a Nano Sim Card (preset). yesteday. Connected to Power and nothing happened! Received an SMS stating SIM Activated. Still Nothing! Emailed and requested assistance because although I am surrounded by Rain Transmitters am getting NO SIGNAL!  Response from Robot that someone will contact. That was 24 hours ago. STILL NOT A SINGLE RESPONSE FROM A HUMAN. The R499 was deducted  over the weekend!
